WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 04 MAR
   BY M/V POLARCUS ADIRA TOWING 9000 METER LONG
   CABLE IN AREA BOUND BY
   25-21S 044-24W, 25-22S 044-24W,
   25-06S 044-15W, 25-06S 044-16W,
   25-05S 044-16W, 25-05S 044-17W,
   25-20S 044-25W, 25-20S 044-26W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 05 MAR 17.
